subject: Some new files from the 12-469 Old Style RS Box
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I did my first session in a week and got a couple good files, please 
listen if you get a chance.  Also, has anybody ever though of recording 
an EVP Maker session in MP3 format and play it back later plugged into 
speakers through an MP3 player while asking questions.  I had attempted 
it about a year ago with minimal success.  I think they need the live 
stream, but if anybody is willing to test it out i would love to hear 
the results.

-Steve H.
